description:
Inside the Seireitei, orders are given and a full-fledged search for the Ryoka is called into action.  Rukia is transferred to the Shishinro Repentence Cell to await her execution and it is becomes more imperative that Ichigo and his fellow Ryoka learn of her whereabouts soon.  Ichigo and Ikkaku`s fight dramatically comes to a close; Ganju and Yumichika challenge each other`s tempers during their continued battle; and Uryu and Orihime find themselves trapped in a raucous chase by a group of Soul Reapers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lancer le coup de la mort
